footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Ororon | Update Date: 08/19/2025 | Editor: .m1zuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Elegy for the End__- Ororon's best 5-star weapon. Provides him with needed ER stat and serves as a good option for his team's damage

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Chain Breaker__ and __Song of Stillness__- good craftable options for Ororon. Song of Stillness requires Ororon to be healed to maintain its passive.
__Alley Hunter__- provides a nice amount of ATK and DMG%.
__The Stringless__- becomes better the more Electro-Charged or Overloaded reactions Ororon himself triggers.
__Favonius Warbow__ - reduces Ororon and his teammates' energy requirements, at the cost of Ororon's personal damage.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands>ATK% or ER|<goblet> Electro DMG Bonus or ATK%|<circlet> CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Character level
**2)** Elemental Burst: Dark Voices Echo
**3)** Elemental Skill: Night's Sling

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Ororon's ER requirements are typically around 160%-190% if he's the solo Electro in the team and ~120% if there's another Electro character in the team
